mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 No, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(BOARD_INSERTDATE, INTERVAL 9 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOARD_INSERTDATE, BOARD_WRITER FROM BOARD_LIST, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r WHERE BOARD_NO > 0 ORDER BY No DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_NO > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_LIST( BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES ( #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, #{board_content} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, DATE_ADD(BOARD_INSERTDATE, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) AS BOARD_INSERTDATE FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_LIST SET BOARD_TITLE = #{board_title}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{board_content} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
